# Master Thesis Project


# Abstract
Predicted breeding values are the most important selection criterion in modern animal breeding programs. The strict implementation of breeding programs in which parents are selected based on their predicted breeding values has lead to the tremendous improvement of product quality and of production efficiency in livestock production.
